title: Challenger Darius Mains: Do they exist?
body:
I've recently gotten into an argument online with someone where the point of contention eventually turned to whether or not there are any 1 trick Darius mains specifically in Challenger. Now, I know that Darius is certainly PLAYED in Diamond+ when he happens to be meta (If I recall he was even played quite a bit in the season 5 LCS), but I was always told that players above Platinum (Hell, probably players IN Platinum as well) were too well adept at exploiting Darius's weakness to kiting and limited utility when behind for him to be consistently viable in those higher elos. However, I'm well aware that I could be wrong.

So am I?

replies.body: Yeah, I suppose Master is good enough. He hasn't really been adding onto the argument anyway. Still, it's nice to know that my main CAN be played in Diamond+ even out of meta.

Its true i main darius and 3 months ago i was plat5 and just skipped division to plat3 and i must say its much harder to play him now,people really learned his weaknesses(even lost vs renekton once) ^^
But Darius is suppose to do badly against Renekton early (unless you build armor on your first back at least)...

Rush randuin's omen over the typical cleaver. Don't use Q unless he starts dashing in. If he ever dashes towards you, activate q and immediately start backstepping, you'll almost always hit your outer q to smooth out the trade.

You outscale renekton at level 6, at level 11 you massively outscale him for the rest of the game.
